alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions with significant blowing and drifting of snow. Snow drifts will be several feet high. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northeast winds between 20 and 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph will occur today. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible. Highways in southeast Fremont County could be closed for a couple of days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...White-out conditions will occur.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
